title: LoLpatcher.exe & BugSplat.dll
body:
So after many fun games today, tried to open LoL and got this error. Tried re-installing and still get the same problem. Downloaded a new bugsplat.dll (thanks for the link whoever you where) but still nothing. Can't even load the client to repair. Ples help peeps.

P.S - I don't speak, read or write Chinese so any translation would be helpful. (My bios is in Chinese and I can't change that)

1love
whet
AKA WHET1

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you navigate to the following directory and let me know if you have a **bugsplat.dll** in there?

>C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\solutions\lol_game_client_sln\releases\0.0.1.121\deploy

If not, first you'll probably want to add an exception in your antivirus for **C:\Riot Games\** this process varies for different AV's, please look up a guide on how to add an exception for your antivirus.

Then I'll get you to download [this copy of bugsplat.dll ](http://puu.sh/nxLLd/7136b7c2ac.dll)and place it in the directory stated above.
